objects.text:
• Advanced Galaxy AI
• 50MP Camera System
• 8K Video Recording
• Long-Lasting Battery

product_details.description: Plus-up your day with Galaxy AI on Galaxy S24+. Wonder where your favorite influencer got their shoes? Simply Circle to Search* with Google to see where you can buy your own pair. Then snap a photo to show off your new kicks and elevate your pic from good to great on Galaxy S24+.  Before you head out in style, call up that new authentic Japanese restaurant to make a reservation and impress the staff as you use Live Translate* to speak their language in real time. And with our most powerful processor yet, you can smoothly switch between texting friends, taking photos of your food and searching for your next culinary adventure.  With Galaxy AI on GalaxyS24+, life just got a whole lot easier —and a lot more fun. Epic, just like that.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a modern and sleek promotional layout for a premium smartphone. It features a bold main title (`heading`) at the top left in dark blue, followed by a stylish model name (`subheading`) in a futuristic font, and a smaller tagline (`tagline`) below. The layout is split into quadrants with subtle grid lines for a tech-inspired theme. The product image (`product_image`) is presented prominently on the right side. The left bottom quadrant includes product highlights (`description`), a highlighted price (`price`), and a vibrant call-to-action button (`cta` and `cta_background`). 

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F0F0F0, #E0E0E0, #D8D8D8  
- Dark Blue: #1A237E (used in main title, button text)
- Royal Blue: #303F9F (used in subheading and bullet icons)
- Yellow: #FFC107 (used in CTA button background)
- White: #FFFFFF (for text and highlight areas)
- Gray: #424242 (for tagline)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern smartphone with a minimalist white-silver body and a cosmic-themed display. The color palette is clean and futuristic, featuring Soft White (#F5F5F5), Metallic Silver (#D9D9D9), Deep Black (#000000), Golden Glow (#FFF59D), and Light Charcoal (#B0B0B0). The white and silver tones dominate the back, blending seamlessly for a premium matte finish, while the glossy black camera lenses stand out. The display includes shimmer effects and golden-yellow orbs, creating a soft highlight that adds elegance. Use this palette for an advertisement banner that reflects sophistication, clarity, and a premium technological feel.
